title: Looking to form a Serious Tournament Team. Need JG, MID, ADC, SUPP. (Gold+ pref)
body:
I am a Top lane main looking to start up a serious competitive ranked team.
This would include participating in tournaments and leagues (when we are ready). 
I finished season 6 at Plat 2, and am currently Plat 5. 

The roles needed are:

Jungle
Mid
ADC
Support

If you do not main one of these roles, don't even bother applying as this is going to be a serious team. 
Fill out the Application Below. Feel free to add me in game if you have any other questions.
If I am interested, i will contact you with the tryout times

League IGN:
Role youre applying for?:
What is your availability(EST):
What was your rank in Season 6:

Thank you for taking the time to apply I will be sure to contact you either on here or through League if I am interested in your application.

replies.body:
League IGN: Alyok Snyn
Role youre applying for?: Mid
What is your availability(EST): Almost all the time.
What was your rank in Season 6: Unranked

Role youre applying for?: Mid
What is your availability(EST): between 4-11 on weekdays. all day weekends.
What was your rank in Season 6: Gold 3, however peak was gold 1.

League IGN: 8 4
Role youre applying for?: ADC
What is your availability(EST): Weekdays 4 PM - 11 PM Weekends: Whenever
What was your rank in Season 6: G5 w/ G3 MMR

Ign: silencega

Available: always
Rank: b5
(I honestly just want to do tryouts to see how a plat player lanes)
